metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9301 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: plugins\audio_filter\libmpgatofixed32_plugin.dll in VideoLAN VLC media player 2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

notes.Note: ratliff> fixes not available as of 2017-08-01 mikesalvatore> fixes not available as of 2018-10-23

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
